channel.title: Cult leader/ Mastermind brainwash/convert question
channel.description:
I have about 20ish hours played over thisnlaat week and I've only had one mastermind game and 1 cult least game but I was not able to learn as much as I would like.
What I'm trying to figure out is if you decide to convert someone and you get roleblocked I know your ability does not go through. Does it go on the 1 day cooldown because you tried to convert or No? Also if a court wizard defends someone your trying to convert does that show up as target was immune and your ability goes on cooldown?

item.title: Cult leader/ Mastermind brainwash/convert question
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
No. This applys to CL too and he isn’t occ immune. It would work if CL used erraticate.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult leader/ Mastermind brainwash/convert question
item.dc:creator: Sandy_Claws
item.description:
Ahh h because occupy immune

Read full topic

item.title: Cult leader/ Mastermind brainwash/convert question
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The drunk will not be converted if he targets the CL or MM unless they are doing so anyway. The drunk’s ability will instead fail.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult leader/ Mastermind brainwash/convert question
item.dc:creator: Sandy_Claws
item.description:
Ok and if the drunk targets the CL/MM the drunk gets converted? So if for any reason it does not go on cooldown?

Read full topic

item.title: Cult leader/ Mastermind brainwash/convert question
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
If the convert fails, the ability does not go into cooldown

Read full topic
